author: RasPiManiac

game.author: Luanti
game.name: minetest_game
game.short_description: The classic "Minetest". A lightweight and well-maintained base for modding
game.title: Minetest Game

long_description:
This is a texture pack by RasPiManiac that is very loosly based on Soothing 32 but 8px instead of 16px.

# Currently supported mods:
* default
* butterflies
* buckets
* beds
* bones
* aquamarine
* carts
* doors
* fireflies
* dye
* fire
* flowers
* screwdriver
* stairs
* tnt

# Coming Soon:
* french_toast
* moreores
* moretrees
* 3d_armor
* (I can't think of any more off the top of my head but the best mods in my opinion will be coming soon)
name: peacefulpixels
short_description: This is RasPiManiac's 8px texture pack based slightly on Soothing 32
title: Peaceful Pixels
